name: Murder In The Dark (MeatyOats)
description:
Inspired by the Mandela Catalogue 

Footage was found, of a bunch of kids encountering an alternate at an underground bunker, late at night. This footage is being viewed in a hope that it can give them more information about these alternates. 

This is a much more needed and improved version of the original game, that was released earlier this year. 

New map, similar environment

Improved story for you to piece together 

Improved effects 

Animation 

And a actual threat 

This is the third game I've made, and it is the most ambitious one yet. 

 Hope this one was worth the wait.
